籤詩版本二:
ULin Wei lihlosi eligada ucango, umele abe namandla angonakalisi abanye.
Kutshiwo ngokucacileyo ukuba akukho lukhuseleko Ixhala, ukuthandabuza, uloyiko kunye noloyiko zisehlathini → iinkuni.
詩意:
Kule hexagram, imithi yehlathi kunye namahlosi anomfanekiso onamandla.
Zonke izilumkiso zobuxoki aziyinyani kangako.
解曰: Isitovu silayita ikhephu. Ingathi umoya uwele kwiindlebe ezingevayo. Inokuba yintsikelelo. Izinto ezintle zilandela kwaye ezimbi zenzeka phambi kwazo.
籤詩故事一:
◇UPang Hong woyika iBao Gong
Renzong yoLawulo lweeNgoma. U-Bao Gong yirhuluneli yaseKaifeng Prefecture (igama elisemthethweni, elilingana ne-prefect). UPang Hong wayenguyisezala (umkhwenyana ka-emperor) kwaye wavalelwa uGeneral Di Qing. Xa uBao Gong ecela ukuxoxwa kwetyala, uPang Hong woyika waza walivala ngeendlela ezininzi. Kamva, eli tyala laye lavela yaye isityholo sobuxoki sikaPang Hong saqinisekiswa. Wangeniswa kumthetho kaKumkani uRenzong weNgoma yeNgoma kwaye wakhululwa ngenxa yezalamane zakhe.
聖意: Ukungakhululeki ekhaya, ukuthetha ngokwakho, ukucela imali, abantu ababi, ishishini elingalunganga, ukungavisisani ngomtshato, uLiujia, i-inshurensi yobuxoki, abahambi ngeenyawo bavalela amasimi, ukonakala kwemibungu yesilika, ukonakala kwemfuyo emithandathu, abantu abalahlekileyo, izimangalo zikawonke-wonke, ilahleko, ukufuduka, ukonga, ukulahleka. impahla, izifo, idini, ingcwaba likaHushan, ububi
